column5: (For last-minute bookings please contact directly)  Enjoy easy living in this 1100 square foot 1950s home. We are minutes from the white oak bayou trail to downtown, TC Jester park for frisbee golf, and tons of local eateries. This central location is your key to Houston. It is our home and we are happy to share! Note, there is lots of parking behind the gate, as well as a 'second home' for your pet outside.
